TopicTitle: Mechjeb pod and rover autopilot ptoblems

Articles.Content:
Rover pilot charges downhill and breaks rovers, even if i set speed to 1 m/s... Breaks work when i press the b button.

The mechjeb pod is not appearing in the pod tab, but the case does. Anyone know why?

Edited May 21, 2018 by Xd the great
Sorry for posting in the wrong place. Oops

Check the install.   May not have all the files.   I'd go find the latest build current for your version of KSP and reinstall it. 

 

 Strike all that.   I believe the pod was phased out many moons ago. 

Sometimes rovers just drive wonky.   I'd check the MJ thread to see if anybody else has had the same issues. 

Edited May 21, 2018 by Gargamel
It is still in the tech level, and i can unlock it in science mode...

Depending on the size of rover, its wheels, the gravity of the body in question -- rovers are seriously messed up right now.

I wouldn't be quite so quick to blame MechJeb.
Sounds like a support issue. And so, moved to support.

I can drive around properly just mechjeb does not know how to brake properly...

P.S. I am not an AI
